attributes.action: Resurrect the Civil Defence Corps & Auxiliary Fire Service as a Civil Emergency Corps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the difficult times we live in and the increased risk of terrorist attacks and our depleted forces at home. The government should introduce a Civil Emergency Corps to supplement the Fire, Rescue and medical services. A large number of Emergency Planning Specialists using public employees if they are willing to cooperate cannot replace what we had prior to Civil Defence disbandment in 1968.
